title: Tzafnat Pa'neach on Mishneh Torah, Prayer and the Priestly Blessing

titles.text: צפנת פענח על משנה תורה, הלכות תפילה וברכת כהנים

enDesc: A difficult and often conceptual commentary, full of references but short on explanation - it is typical of the unique genius of the Rogatchover Gaon.
